accountRemoval.subject: Your Account Has Been Removed
accountRemoval.body:
Hello [USER],

We're sorry to see you go! Your account with [AUCTION] has been removed as per your request. If you didn't request account removal or have any further questions, please contact our support team at [SUPPORT EMAIL].

Best regards,
The [AUCTION] Team

accountDeletionConfirmation.subject: Account Deletion Confirmation
accountDeletionConfirmation.body:
Hello [USER],

If you change your mind, you can always re-register.

Best regards,
The [AUCTION] Team
